structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.catch_line: Action Against Defaulting Trustee; Execution Against Trustee For Costs
law.text: If a person summoned as trustee is held liable to pay from his own estate the costs as before provided, and if he is at the same time liable for the plaintiffâ€™s costs in the original action, one execution shall be issued against him for both amounts.
